name: Arcane Archer

grantsPowers.name: Arcane Barrier
grantsPowers.description: Gain a Barrier, and Elemental Barrier Resistance

grantsPowers.name: Way Of The Trails
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increase Out of Combat Movement

description: The Arcane Archer is one of the most deadly of mystical manipulators. Harnessing the power of the elements allows the archer to root their enemies while also creating protective barriers and enhancing their quickness with an unrivaled adroitness.
lore: With my bow and arrows I rain down the elements upon my enemy, slowing them and prolonging their agony as I swiftly maneuver to my next target.
